body_html:
@apaszke Makes sense; memory imbalance with DataParallel is the exact cause of my problem.

Though, outside of the DataParallel case, if my old GPU was at the index 0, would PyTorch try to use it? Or does it use the GPU with the largest memory?

body:
@apaszke Makes sense; memory imbalance with DataParallel is the exact cause of my problem.

Though, outside of the DataParallel case, if my old GPU was at the index 0, would PyTorch try to use it? Or does it use the GPU with the largest memory?
